metadata.title: CVE-2020-10074 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GitLab 10.1 through 12.8.1 has Incorrect Access Control. A scenario wasdiscovered in which a GitLab account could be taken over through an expiredlink.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
